p:
Even with the containment measures in China and in Italy, there was a global expansion of transmission, and in mid-March, 2020 the Johns Hopkins University specialized site disclosed the confirmation of over 200 thousand cases in over 160 countries and territories, with over nine thousand deaths and 82 thousand individuals recovered.
8 On March 11, 2020, the World Health Organization declared the Covid-19 pandemic.
9 Italy is currently the most affected country, with over 30 thousand cases and over 3000 deaths. WHO declared Europe the new epicenter of the Pandemic.
8
